title: Best of The Herd: 11/07/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 11/07/2018
description:
Colin reacts to the breaking news that Dez Bryant is signing with the Saints and thinks it is a direct result of Josh Gordon's success with the Patriots. He shares a scary stat that shows the closest direct comparison for Dak Prescott is Blake Bortles. Plus, recently fired Browns Head Coach Hue Jackson comes in studio to explain what went wrong in Cleveland and why he thinks Baker Mayfield is going to be great. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
